snippet.title: Better translator: Machines or humans?
snippet.description:
* One of the Internet's great promises is that it's the ultimate democratizer. It's open to everyone and allows all people to communicate.
http://www.cnn.com/2009/TECH/10/24/tech.language.fb.google/index.html

snippet.title: Who's the better translator: Machines or humans?
snippet.description:
* One of the Internet's great promises is that it's the ultimate democratizer. It's open to everyone and allows all people to communicate.

snippet.title: Reviews: 'The Ring,' 'The Osbournes: Uncensored'
snippet.description:
* Horror movies are like pornography -- what does it for me may not do it for you, and the reason is best left to psychiatrists.
http://www.cnn.com/2003/SHOWBIZ/Movies/03/04/ew.review.dvd.ring/index.html
